mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as totalCount FROM car WHERE 1=1

SELECT id, ymd, event_cd, event_nm, km, ju_cost, ju_place, ju_wonja, jb_cost, jb_place, jb_note, upd_id, upd_dt FROM jskndb.car WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY upd_dt DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO technote ( ymd, event_cd, event_nm, km, ju_cost, ju_place, ju_wonja, jb_cost, jb_place, jb_note, upd_id, upd_dt )VALUES( #{ymd}, #{event_cd}, #{event_nm}, #{km}, #{ju_cost}, #{ju_place}, #{ju_wonja}, #{jb_cost}, #{jb_place}, #{jb_note}, #{upd_id}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE technote SET ymd = #{ymd}, event_cd = #{event_cd}, event_nm = #{event_nm}, km = #{km}, ju_cost = #{ju_cost}, ju_place = #{ju_place}, ju_wonja = #{ju_wonja}, jb_cost = #{jb_cost}, jb_place = #{jb_place}, jb_note = #{jb_note}, upd_id = #{upd_id}, upd_dt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE 1=1 AND id = #{id}
